name: Cybernator (itch)
description:
I found the source code for this game after thinking it has been lost since reformatting in 2014. Luckily, it was still on dropbox! This game was never really finished, as it's still missing any kind of bossfight. Maybe I'll get around to do that. Or not. Anyways, I hope you can have a little bit of fun with this.

Each level contains a set number of people that you must save! Pick them up and carry them to the nearest "Disconnection Station".

Any dead enemy drop money. With this money, you can buy medkits and weapons to be uploaded to you, press TAB for an overview.

Using the left mouse button, you shoot. The right mouse button can be used to set the time to SLOW MOTION.

Also, the game's music comes from this dude: https://teque.planet-d.net/
